game.name: Etrange Overlord
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Join Étrange on this musical odyssey as she seeks to conquer hell in the pursuit of living her best afterlife.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join Étrange on this musical odyssey as she seeks to conquer hell in the pursuit of living her best afterlife.
game.developers: Gemdrops, Inc., Superniche LLC, BROCCOLI Co.
